CustomField.description: This field contains the Price you need to pay,after availing discount
CustomField.formula: IF((M_Boat_MSRP_PRICE__c + M_Trailer_MSRP_PRICE__c)> M_Discount__c ,(M_Boat_MSRP_PRICE__c + M_Trailer_MSRP_PRICE__c) - M_Discount__c ,(M_Boat_MSRP_PRICE__c + M_Trailer_MSRP_PRICE__c))
CustomField.label: Your Price (Calculated)
